word:
My heart is full of earnest sympathy and love for the churches that are ready to die and are merely struggling for an existence. I say over and over, He has bought the church with His own blood and is longing to clothe her with 
                                                                           751
His righteousness and salvation. He has made her the depository of His precious doctrines, holy truths, and He wants to make them participants of His glory.
